full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL SRAS LAG LEN GYI 'GREL PA GZHAN PHAN BDUD RTZI'I ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

GNAS BRTAN CHEN PO DKON MCHOG DGE 'DUN DANG, DAD BRTZON DANG MKHYEN RAB PHUL DU BYUNG BA GSER KHA CHOS RJE RNAM GNYIS KYIS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^RGYAL MKHAN MING GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DAD PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,AOm SVA STI, YE SHES SPYAN RAS STONG GI CHA KUN NAS, ,RIGS DRUG 'GRO LA NYIN MTSAN DUS DRUG TU, ,BRTZEGS GZIGS PA NAM @063A *, ,YANG MI LHOD PA, ,'PHAGS MCHOG SPYAN RAS GZIGS LA GUS PAS 'DUD, ,RGYAL KUN BYAMS BRTZE BDUD RTZI'I SNYING PO KUN, ,GCIG TU 'KHYIL BA'I MTSAN DPE'I ZA MA TOG ,NOR BU PADMA 'DZIN PA'I MTSAN GSOL LHA, ,NGUR SMRIG TSUL BZUNG RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED PA'I, ,DAM CHOS 'O MA BSRUBS PA LAS PHYUNGS PA'I, ,BYANG SEMS SKYE 'PHAGS BSLAB BYA'I MAR GSAR ZAS, ,BSTEN PA'I MDO LA SEMS DPAR LUS BSGYUR BA'I, ,MDO SNGAGS SROG GI BCUD LEN BDUD RTZI 'DI, ,RANG GI PHYI NANG CHOS LDAN BYA BA KUN, ,GCIG TU KHUR DU 'KHYER BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,'DI PHYIR PHAN PA SGRUB PA'I NYE GNAS MCHOG ,DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS BRTZON 'GRUS ZHES BYA BAS, ,'DZAD MED PAR DU BSGRUBS PAS TSE RABS SU, ,'PHAGS PA'I NOR BDUN MTHO RIS YON TAN DANG, ,THEG MCHOG 'KHOR LO BZHI LDAN LEGS THOB NAS, ,SRID PA'I RGYA MTSO CHE LAS MYUR THAR SHOG ,MA 'ONGS SKYE BA'I PHRENG BA THAMS CAD DU, ,'BRAL MED THAR PA SGRUB PA'I GROGS BGYID CING, ,KHYAD PAR NAM ZHIG TSE LO BRGYAD KHRI'I DUS, ,BYAMS MGON MDUN SAR SHES BZHIN MJAL BAR SMON, ,DAL 'BYOR PADMA DKAR PO'I PHRENG BAR YANG, ,BSHES GNYEN NYIN BYED 'OD KYIS REG PA LAS, ,BYANG SEMS SBRANG RTZI'I ZIL MNGAR RAB RGYAS SHING, ,LUNG RTOGS 'DAB BRGYA CHES CHER BZHAD PAR SHOG ,SRAS BCAS RGYAL BA'I RLABS CHEN SMON LAM DANG, ,SEMS DPA' CHEN PO'I GZHAN PHAN @063B (ZHES RGYAL SRAS LAG LEN GYI 'GREL PA GZHAN PHAN BDUD RTZI'I ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NYID, RANG GI NYE GNAS DGE SLONG 'JAM
